channel.title: poetry on Ellen Xu
channel.description: Recent content in poetry on Ellen Xu

item.title: Wonder
item.description: Wonder + Humor such an interesting combination how to say – light-hearted or intense? scientific or fun-loving? rigorous or flamboyant? why not both? perhaps both are a way to poke & prod at the universe to have such a love for the world, happiness, & people Wonder + Humor Inspired by Feynman

item.title: Interstellar
item.description: warning: spoiler alert I. Anything that can go wrong, will go wrong. Yet the law’s origin was the space Where the sound barrier was broken. My father prepared me for the worst, Fully knowing he would succumb to the Gravity of a life-seeking universe. The year 2067, Our truck cut through cornfields, Dust bowling over pins of maize— Survivors of a blight which Folded population like diseased leaves,
